#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define SI(x) scanf("%d",&x)
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    SI(t);
    while(t-- >0)
    {
        int n;
        SI(n);
        bool ok = false;
        int nf = n/7;
        for(int f=nf;f>=0;f--)
        {
            int rem = n-(f*7);
            if(rem%4==0)
            {
                printf("%d\n",f*7);
                ok = true;
                break;
            }
        }

        if(!ok) printf("-1\n");
    }

    return 0;
}
